commands.aliases: disable-command, cmd-off, command-off, disablecommand, cmdoff, commandoff
commands.description: Disables a command or command category.
commands.name: disable

commands.description: Used to change the default embed color the bot uses for responses, or reset it.
commands.details: Supplying no hex color resets the embed color to default.
commands.name: embed-color

commands.aliases: enable-command, cmd-off, command-off, enablecommand, cmdoff, commandoff
commands.description: Enables a command or command group.
commands.name: enable

commands.description: Used to change the bot's nickname on your server, or reset it.
commands.details: Supplying no nickname resets the nickname to default.
commands.name: nick

commands.description: Returns or sets the command prefix.
commands.details:
If no prefix is provided, the current prefix will be shown.
If the prefix is "default", the prefix will be reset to the bot's default prefix.
If the prefix is "none", the prefix will be removed entirely, only allowing mentions to run commands.
commands.name: prefix

commands.description: Have the bot post an announcement to a pre-configured or specified channel.
commands.name: announce

commands.description: Used to configure the message to be sent when a user leaves your guild.
commands.details:
**Subcommand Usage**:
`status` - return the goodbye feature configuration details.
`message ` - set the goodbye message. Use { guild } for guild name, and { user } to reference the user leaving.
`channel <#channelMention>` - set the channel for the goodbye message to be displayed.
`on` - enable the goodbye message feature.
`off` - disable the goodbye message feature.
commands.name: goodbye

commands.description: Used to configure the :star: Star Board feature.
commands.details:
**Subcommand Usage**:
`status` - returns the star board configuration details.
`channel <#channelMention>` - sets star board channel to the channel supplied.
`trigger ` - sets emoji to save to star board.
`on` - enable the star board feature.
`off` - disable the star board feature.
commands.name: starboard

commands.description: Used to configure the Terms of Service for a guild.
commands.details:
**Subcommand Usage**:
`channel <#channelMention>` - set the channel to display the terms of service in.
`title ` - edit the title of a terms of service info block.
`body ` - edit the body of a terms of service info block.
`get (raw:boolean)` - returns the requested block number.
`list` - return all the terms of service embedded blocks.
`status` - return the terms of service feature configuration details.
`welcome enabled ` - enable/disable terms of service welcome message.
`welcome message ` - set the welcome text to prompt users to accept the terms of service.
commands.name: terms-of-service

commands.description: Used to configure the message to be sent when a new user join your guild.
commands.details:
**Subcommand Usage**:
`status` - return the welcome feature configuration details.
`message ` - set the welcome message. Use { guild } for guild name, and { user } to reference the user joining.
`channel <#channelMention>` - set the channel for the welcome message to be displayed.
`on` - enable the welcome message feature.
`off` - disable the welcome message feature.
commands.name: welcome

commands.description: Enable or disable the adblock feature.
commands.name: adblock

commands.description: Enable or disable the modlog feature.
commands.details:
**Subcommand Usage**:
`status` - return the mod log configuration details.
`channel <#channelMention>` - set mod log channel to the channel supplied.
`on` - enable the mod log feature.
`off` - disable the mod log feature.
commands.name: modlog

commands.description: Used to add or remove roles from your server.
commands.details:
**Subcommand Usage**:
`add "role name" (hexcolor)` - adds the role to your guild with the supplied color.
`remove role name` - removes the role from your guild.
commands.name: role
